text_prompt: Create an image of an EXTREME WIDE SHOT, low angle, capturing a vast, sleek, neon-drenched cityscape at night. Towering structures dominate the frame, featuring holographic screens displaying abstract data streams. In the immediate foreground, the tiny silhouettes of a massive crowd are gathered before an immense, glowing dome structure labeled 'Premiere Event'. The environment is high-tech and oppressive. Since no specific characters are to be visible, no character references are needed. Maintain the high-tech, neon-drenched cyberpunk style suggested by the environment.
